headline: Is It Worth Investing in Newmont (NEM) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Newmont (NEM). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
